cookingMethod.description: Grill the seasoned steak on high heat for a few minutes on each side, then finish with a pat of butter for added flavor and juiciness.
Spread a thin layer of seasoned ground lamb mixture over a thin dough, then bake it in a hot oven until the crust is crispy and the topping is cooked.
Layer shredded kadayif pastry with mozzarella cheese, then bake until the cheese is melted and the pastry turns golden. Drizzle with sugar syrup and sprinkle crushed pistachios on top.

description: Nusret Gökçe, also known as Salt Bae, is a renowned Turkish chef and restaurateur. He gained international fame through his unique style of seasoning and serving meat, which involves a theatrical and flamboyant manner of sprinkling salt on the meat with a signature move. Nusret owns and operates a chain of high-end steakhouses called Nusr-Et, which has locations in various cities around the world. His captivating social media presence, where he shares videos of his culinary skills and stylish presentation, has garnered him millions of followers. Nusret's distinctive appearance, characterized by his slicked-back hair, sunglasses, and perfectly trimmed mustache, has also contributed to his iconic status. His passion for food and dedication to his craft have made him one of the most recognized and influential chefs in the culinary world.

cookingMethod.description: Slice the eggplants, stuff them with a mixture of ground meat, onion, garlic, and spices, then bake until the eggplants are tender and the filling is cooked.
Marinate the chicken with lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and herbs, then roast it in the oven until golden and cooked through. Serve with roasted vegetables.
Coat the tuna steak with sesame seeds, pan-sear it to desired doneness, and serve with a soy-ginger-lime sauce. Garnish with fresh herbs.

description: Şemsa Denizsel is a talented Turkish chef known for her innovative approach to Anatolian cuisine. She is the owner of Kantin, a popular restaurant in Istanbul that focuses on using locally sourced, seasonal ingredients to create delicious and modern dishes.

cookingMethod.description: Boil manti pasta until tender, then serve with a yogurt sauce flavored with garlic and mint. Top with sautéed ground beef and drizzle with melted butter.
Stuff grape leaves with a mixture of rice, onion, dill, and pine nuts. Roll them tightly and cook in a pot with water and olive oil until tender.
Sauté onion, carrots, and potatoes, then add red lentils, water, and spices. Simmer until lentils are soft, then blend until smooth. Serve hot with crusty bread.

description: Didem Şenol Tiryakioğlu is a renowned Turkish chef and cookbook author. She is recognized for her expertise in Turkish cuisine and her efforts to promote traditional Turkish recipes. Didem owns the restaurant Çiya in Istanbul, where she showcases a wide range of regional Anatolian dishes.

cookingMethod.description: Prepare a selection of traditional Istanbul mezes including roasted eggplant with yogurt, chickpeas in olive oil, charred red peppers, marinated olives, and fresh herbs. Serve with crusty bread.
Boil manti pasta until tender, then sauté with browned butter and paprika. Serve with a topping of sautéed ground beef and caramelized onions.
Blend white fish fillets, onion, garlic, breadcrumbs, and spices into a paste. Shape into kofta patties and grill until cooked. Serve with a squeeze of lemon.

description: Mehmet Gürs is a well-known Turkish chef and restaurateur. He is the founder of Mikla, a critically acclaimed restaurant located in Istanbul. Mehmet combines Turkish and Scandinavian influences in his cuisine, creating unique and innovative dishes that have earned him international recognition.

cookingMethod.description: Prepare a dough with flour, yeast, and water. Roll it out and top with a mixture of ground meat, cheese, tomato, and pepper. Bake until the crust is golden and the toppings are cooked.
Prepare a dough with flour, roll it out, and fill with a mixture of spinach, feta cheese, onion, and olive oil. Cook on a griddle until the dough is crispy and the filling is cooked.
Layer shredded kadayif pastry with cheese, then bake until the cheese is melted and the pastry turns golden. Drizzle with sugar syrup and sprinkle crushed pistachios on top.

description: CZN Burak, whose real name is Burak Özdemir, is a popular Turkish chef and social media personality. Known for his entertaining cooking videos, CZN Burak has gained a massive following on various social media platforms. He owns several restaurants, including Hatay Medeniyetler Sofrası, where he serves traditional Turkish and Middle Eastern dishes.

cookingMethod.description: Grill or roast lamb, then finely chop or shred it. Grill eggplants and mash them with garlic. Layer mashed eggplants and lamb, then top with yogurt, tomato, and parsley.
Sauté chicken with onion, then transfer to a casserole dish. Add tomatoes, peppers, herbs, and spices. Bake in the oven until the chicken is cooked and the flavors meld together.
Cook lamb until tender, then shred it. Prepare a dough with yogurt, flour, and egg. Cut the dough into small pieces and cook them in the lamb broth. Serve with shredded lamb, mint, and melted butter.

description: Maksut Aşkar is a celebrated Turkish chef known for his culinary expertise in Ottoman cuisine. He is the executive chef of Neolokal, a restaurant in Istanbul that showcases traditional Ottoman recipes with a modern twist. Maksut's passion for reviving and preserving Turkish culinary heritage has made him a prominent figure in the culinary scene.
